name: Void-Venture
description:
Move with WASD, fly with SPACE, shoot with LEFT CLICK and press E to enter the portal and pick up items!

Try to get as deep in the inevidable doom that is the void!

Face 2 enemies and pick up 10 items to aid you in getting a better score!

Made with python and pygame in 6 days for the 1 st scriptline jam!
